articles.title: What is Echoelmusic?
articles.content: Echoelmusic is an all-in-one creative platform that combines a professional DAW (Digital Audio Workstation), video editing, 3D visual effects, social sharing, and live streaming in one powerful application. Create music, edit videos, design visuals, and share your work - all in one place.

articles.title: Feature Overview
articles.content:
Echoelmusic offers:

• **Music Production**: Full DAW with unlimited tracks, MIDI, automation, VST/AU plugins
• **AI Tools**: AI mixing, mastering, sound design, and beat detection
• **Video Editing**: Multi-track timeline, color grading, keyframe animation
• **3D Visuals**: Real-time particle effects, PBR rendering, node-based system
• **Social**: Share projects, follow creators, join challenges
• **Collaboration**: Real-time co-creation with team members
• **Cloud Sync**: Access projects from any device
• **Broadcasting**: Stream to multiple platforms simultaneously

articles.title: Supported Platforms
articles.content:
Echoelmusic is available on:

• iOS 15+ (iPhone, iPad)
• macOS 12+ (Intel & Apple Silicon)
• Windows 10/11 (64-bit)
• Linux (Ubuntu 20.04+, Fedora, Arch)
• Web (Chrome, Firefox, Safari, Edge)

**Minimum Requirements:**
• 8GB RAM (16GB recommended)
• 4-core CPU (8-core recommended)
• 10GB free storage
• GPU with Metal/OpenGL 3.3+ support

articles.title: Installation Guide
articles.content:
**iOS/iPadOS:**
1. Open App Store
2. Search 'Echoelmusic'
3. Tap 'Get' to download
4. Open and sign in

**macOS:**
1. Download from Mac App Store or echoelmusic.com
2. Open .dmg file
3. Drag to Applications
4. Launch and sign in

**Windows:**
1. Download installer from echoelmusic.com
2. Run setup.exe
3. Follow installation wizard
4. Launch and sign in

**Linux:**
Choose your package format:
• AppImage: Download, make executable, run
• .deb: `sudo dpkg -i echoelmusic.deb`
• Flatpak: `flatpak install com.echoelmusic.Echoelmusic`
• Snap: `snap install echoelmusic`

articles.title: Pricing Plans
articles.content:
**Free:**
• 3 projects
• Basic features
• Watermarked exports
• No cloud sync

**Pro (€9.99/month or €99/year):**
• Unlimited projects
• All features
• No watermarks
• 50GB cloud storage
• Priority support

**Studio (€19.99/month or €199/year):**
• Everything in Pro
• 500GB cloud storage
• Advanced AI features
• Collaboration (5 users)
• Marketplace seller access

All paid plans include a 30-day money-back guarantee.

articles.title: How to Upgrade
articles.content:
**In the App:**
1. Open Settings
2. Tap 'Subscription'
3. Choose Pro or Studio
4. Select monthly or annual
5. Complete payment

**Accepted Payment Methods:**
• Credit/Debit cards (Visa, Mastercard, Amex)
• Apple Pay
• SEPA Direct Debit (Germany/EU)
• PayPal

Your subscription starts immediately and renews automatically. Cancel anytime.

articles.title: How to Cancel
articles.content:
**Cancel Anytime:**

**iOS/Mac App Store:**
1. Open Settings app
2. Tap your name → Subscriptions
3. Select Echoelmusic
4. Tap 'Cancel Subscription'

**In the App (Web/Stripe):**
1. Open Settings → Subscription
2. Tap 'Cancel Subscription'
3. Confirm cancellation

Your access continues until the end of your billing period. No refunds for partial periods.

**30-Day Guarantee:**
First-time subscribers get a full refund within 30 days. Email refund@echoelmusic.com

articles.title: Refund Policy
articles.content:
**30-Day Money-Back Guarantee:**
First-time Pro/Studio subscribers can request a full refund within 30 days of their first payment.

**How to Request:**
Email refund@echoelmusic.com with:
• Your account email
• Reason for refund (optional)
• Order/Transaction ID

Refunds processed within 5-7 business days to original payment method.

**Note:** Refunds not available for:
• Renewals after first 30 days
• Marketplace purchases
• App Store subscriptions (managed by Apple)

articles.title: App Crashes or Freezes
articles.content:
**Quick Fixes:**

1. **Restart the app**
2. **Update to latest version** (Settings → About → Check for Updates)
3. **Clear cache** (Settings → Storage → Clear Cache)
4. **Free up disk space** (need 5GB minimum)

**Still crashing?**

1. **Check system requirements** (8GB RAM, 4-core CPU)
2. **Close other apps** (free up RAM)
3. **Disable plugins** (Settings → Plugins → Disable All)
4. **Reinstall app** (backup projects first!)

**Persistent issues?**
Email support@echoelmusic.com with:
• Device/OS version
• App version
• When crash occurs
• Crash logs (Settings → Help → Send Diagnostics)

articles.title: No Sound or Audio Issues
articles.content:
**Check these first:**

1. **Volume** - Is app volume and system volume up?
2. **Output Device** - Settings → Audio → Output Device
3. **Sample Rate** - Match project (44.1kHz or 48kHz)
4. **Buffer Size** - Increase if crackling (Settings → Audio → Buffer Size → 512 or 1024)
5. **Driver** - Update audio interface drivers

**Common Solutions:**

• **No sound**: Check mute/solo on tracks, master volume
• **Crackling**: Increase buffer size, close other apps
• **Latency**: Decrease buffer size, use ASIO (Windows) or CoreAudio (Mac)
• **Interface not detected**: Restart app, replug USB, check permissions

articles.title: Cloud Sync Not Working
articles.content:
**Troubleshoot sync:**

1. **Check internet** - Need stable connection
2. **Check storage** - Settings → Cloud → Storage Used
3. **Check subscription** - Cloud sync requires Pro/Studio
4. **Toggle sync** - Settings → Cloud → Disable → Enable
5. **Check permissions** - Allow iCloud/Google Drive access

**Manual sync:**
Settings → Cloud → Sync Now

**Still not syncing?**
• Log out and back in
• Check firewall/VPN settings
• Contact support@echoelmusic.com

articles.title: Create Your First Project
articles.content:
**Quick Start:**

1. **Tap '+' or File → New Project**
2. **Choose template** or start blank
3. **Set tempo and key** (optional)
4. **Tap 'Create'**

**Add tracks:**
• Tap '+' in track list
• Choose: Audio, MIDI, Video, or Visual

**Record audio:**
1. Arm track (red button)
2. Check input (Settings → Audio → Input)
3. Tap record (or R key)

**Add MIDI:**
1. Create MIDI track
2. Tap to draw notes in piano roll
3. Choose instrument from library

**Export:**
File → Export → Choose format → Export

See video tutorials: echoelmusic.com/tutorials

articles.title: Using AI Features
articles.content:
**AI Tools Available:**

**AI Mixing:**
• Auto-balance levels
• Detect frequency conflicts
• Suggest EQ/compression
• Generate mastering chain

Use: Select tracks → AI → Auto-Mix

**AI Sound Design:**
• Generate custom sounds
• Describe what you want ("warm pad", "punchy kick")
• Adjust parameters

Use: Instruments → AI Sound Design

**AI Mastering:**
• LUFS normalization
• Genre-adaptive processing
• Streaming platform optimization

Use: Master track → AI → Auto-Master

**Beat Detection:**
• Detect tempo
• Find beats
• Extract key/chords

Use: Audio track → AI → Analyze

*AI features require Pro or Studio subscription.

commonIssues.question: How do I cancel my subscription?
commonIssues.answer: Go to Settings → Subscription → Cancel, or manage via App Store subscriptions.

commonIssues.question: Why is my app crashing?
commonIssues.answer: Try: Update app, clear cache, free up disk space, or reinstall. See troubleshooting guide.

commonIssues.question: How much does it cost?
commonIssues.answer: Free tier available. Pro: €9.99/month, Studio: €19.99/month. 30-day money-back guarantee.

commonIssues.question: Can I use plugins?
commonIssues.answer: Yes! Supports VST3, AU, and AUv3 plugins. Load in Settings → Plugins.

commonIssues.question: How do I export my project?
commonIssues.answer: File → Export → Choose format (WAV, MP3, MP4, etc.) → Export.
